thought: I now know the final answer. The website https://www.shopnurturepet.shop/ is a scam site.

observation.reason: The website exhibits unusually low prices with discounts of up to 50% on a wide variety of pet supplies which is a common characteristic of scam websites. In addition the error encountered when trying to retrieve WHOIS information raises suspicions about the legitimacy of the website. Furthermore there is no clear privacy policy available and the company information is not accessible indicating that the website may not be trustworthy.
